Package entities

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Controller
    Singleton class that accepts and handles requests from other modules e.g.
    Course
    A course object defines a course by its m_name, the used submission system, the location of the course documents, the folder structure in the submission system, as well as the Authentication information for the specific submission system.
    Exercise
    The Class representing an Exercise.
    ExerciseContext
    Holds the Context of a Exercise object, created by an ExerciseContextFactory.
    ExerciseContextFactory
    A factory for creating ExerciseContext.
    ExerciseMetadata  
    GenerateMailObjectHelper
    Class to help with the creation of mailObjects.
    State
    This class provides methods to save the state of GRIT to the disk and read from it.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    LanguageType
    This enum stores the languages supported by GRIT.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    BadConfigException
    Indicates that the configuration of the throwing object is not correct.
    ConnectionUsedException
    Indicates that the connection is still used and therefore cannot be deleted.
    CouldNotRebootException
    Thrown if GRIT could not be rebooted.
    WrongDateException
    Exception that indicates a wrong date has been set.
